statements: SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM student_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_id, progress FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE progress > 0.5;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress, completion_status FROM student_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress FROM student_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY progress DESC, student_id ASC
SELECT course_id, AVG(progress) AS average_progress FROM student_progress GROUP BY course_id HAVING AVG(progress) > 50
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress FROM student_progress WHERE progress < 0.5 ORDER BY course_id DESC, student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS completed_courses FROM student_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE GROUP BY student_id HAVING completed_courses > 1
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND progress > 0.8 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, total_points FROM students WHERE current_level > 5;
SELECT student_name, current_level FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE points_earned >= 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT student_name, level_completed FROM students INNER JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id;
SELECT student_name, current_level FROM students ORDER BY current_level DESC;
SELECT progress_id, level_completed, points_earned FROM progress WHERE points_earned > 50 ORDER BY progress_id;
SELECT student_name, total_points FROM students WHERE total_points BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT student_name, current_level, points_earned FROM students JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id WHERE level_completed >= 5 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT * FROM students INNER JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id WHERE total_points > 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, progress FROM students WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT student_name, level_name, score FROM students JOIN scores ON students.student_id = scores.student_id JOIN levels ON scores.level_id = levels.level_id;
SELECT student_name, progress FROM students ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT level_name, required_score FROM levels;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT student_id, student_name, score FROM students JOIN scores ON students.student_id = scores.student_id;
SELECT student_name, level_name, completed, timestamp FROM students s JOIN progress_tracking pt ON s.student_id = pt.student_id JOIN levels l ON pt.level_id = l.level_id WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, progress_percent AS progress_achieved FROM students s JOIN progress_tracking pt ON s.student_id = pt.student_id WHERE progress_percent >= 0.6;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percentage FROM Students s JOIN Progress p ON s.student_id = p.student_id JOIN Courses c ON p.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT s.student_name, c.course_name, p.progress_percentage FROM Students s JOIN Progress p ON s.student_id = p.student_id JOIN Courses c ON p.course_id = c.course_id;

SELECT e.enrollment_id, s.student_name, c.course_name, e.enrollment_date FROM Enrollments e JOIN Students s ON e.student_id = s.student_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE e.enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.student_name, COUNT(p.progress_id) AS num_progress FROM Students s LEFT JOIN Progress p ON s.student_id = p.student_id GROUP BY s.student_name HAVING COUNT(p.progress_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor IS NOT NULL ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM assignments WHERE max_points > 50 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, points_received FROM grades WHERE points_received < 70;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT name, grade_level FROM students WHERE total_points > 100 AND grade_level < 12;
SELECT course_name, count(*) as num_assignments FROM courses JOIN assignments ON courses.id = assignments.course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT students.name, grades.points_received FROM students JOIN grades ON students.id = grades.student_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor, due_date FROM courses JOIN assignments ON courses.id = assignments.course_id WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
